text: Zvirokwazvo, avo ngirozi dzinotora moyo yavo vari pakati pekutadza pachezvavo (sekugara kwavanoita nevasingatendi nyangwe zvazvo kutama kwakave kunomanikidzirwa kwavari), (Ngirozi) dzinoti (kwavari): “Maive muri pachidanho chipi?” Vanopindura vachiti: “Tangatiri vanhu vakaneta uye taidzvanyirirwa panyika.” (Ngirozi) dzinoti: “Nyika yaAllah yange isina kufara here kwamuri kuti muve munotama mairi?” Vanhu vakadaro vachagara kuGehena. Uye inzvimbo yakashata kugara
